description: Police are patrolling the area after the incident in which a car's rear window was shattered, police say.
title: Child injured after metal projectile fired at car
title_page: Dorking: Child injured after metal projectile fired at car on A24 - BBC News
maintext:
Police are appealing for witnesses after a child was injured by a metal projectile fired at a car in Surrey.
Emergency services were called following a report of criminal damage and assault near the North Holmwood roundabout on the A24 in Dorking at about 15:45 GMT on Wednesday.
A metal projectile, potentially from a catapult, was fired at a car causing the rear window to shatter, police said.
A child sustained injuries which did not require hospital treatment.
